attributes.action: Sack Alan Johnson and apologise to the entire scientific community for undermining the value of scientific research in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Alan Johnson has shown that he is not fit to hold office by his treatment of the scientific community. He has deliberately ignored good scientific research in order to pander to hysterical right-wing daily mail readers.

This shows a massive lack of judgement on his part and renders him unfit to govern. 

The huge effect on both the current scientific community and children being encouraged to take up science has been irreparably damaged by a man looking out for his own political ends rather then the safety of people in the UK

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
